name: Cranky Frog
description:
Help Cranky escape the toy factory. Stick to walls, jump, and croak your way as far as you can get through an endless onslaught of bugs, boxes, and pipe obstacles.

Cranky Frog is an endless side scrolling platforming game for the Playdate built as development practice and spurred by just an interest in the system as a whole.

Please note that this game runs ONLY on the Playdate or Playdate Simulators

Features
  • 2 Styles of play (Jumper or Scroller)
  • High Score Trackers
  • Endless runs
  • Smooth FPS
Controls
  1. Use the Crank to Aim your jump
  2. Press and hold DOWN
  3. Use the Crank to Charge your jump
  4. Release DOWN to jump
  5. Press A to Croak, it doesn't do anything but you could do it 
Credits

Art, Development, Sound: Erik Onaperd
Music: NOT JAM [itchio]
Dither CSP Brushes: Pixelglade [twitter]
